scripts.deploy:prod: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=6144 && export NODE_ENV=prod && npm run deploy:env
scripts.updateAdapters: cd DefiLlama-Adapters && git checkout main && git pull
scripts.clear-cache: export HISTORICAL=true && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node  --transpile-only  src/cli/clearProtocolCache.ts
scripts.fillOld: export HISTORICAL=true && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node  --transpile-only  src/cli/fillOld.ts
scripts.fillOldChain: export HISTORICAL=true && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node  --transpile-only  src/cli/fillOldChain.ts
scripts.fillLast: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node  --transpile-only  src/cli/fillLast.ts
scripts.delete-tvl: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/cli/deleteTvl.ts
scripts.displayData: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/cli/displayData.ts
scripts.customFill: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/cli/customFill.ts
scripts.backfill-dex-script: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/dexVolumes/cli/backfillUtilities/auto.ts
scripts.backfill-dex-local-script: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && export runLocal='true' && npx ts-node src/dexVolumes/cli/backfillUtilities/auto.ts
scripts.backfill-dex: npm run update-submodules && npm run backfill-dex-script
scripts.backfill-dex-local: npm run update-submodules && npm run backfill-dex-local-script
scripts.check-adapters: npm run update-submodules && npx ts-node src/dexVolumes/cli/checkNonEnabledDexs.ts
scripts.update-submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote --merge && npm run prebuild
scripts.backfill: npm run update-submodules && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/adaptors/cli/backfillUtilities/auto.ts
scripts.backfill-local: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && export runLocal='true' && npx ts-node --logError  --transpile-only src/adaptors/cli/backfillUtilities/auto.ts
scripts.get-overview-local: npm run update-submodules && export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && export runLocal='true' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/adaptors/cli/runGetOverview.ts
scripts.task-tvl: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx --node-arg=--max-old-space-size=6144 ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/storeTvlTask.ts
scripts.store-chain-assets: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/storeChainAssets.ts
scripts.store-chain-asset-historical-flows: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/storeChainAssetFlows.ts
scripts.store-emissions: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/storeEmissions.ts
scripts.store-emissions-index: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node src/storeEmissionsIndex.ts
scripts.run-local: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/runLocalTVL.ts
scripts.cron-dimensions: export AWS_REGION='eu-central-1' && export tableName='prod-table' && npx  --node-options='--max-old-space-size=20144' ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/api2/cron-task/dimensions.ts
scripts.dimensions-store-all: npx  --node-options='--max-old-space-size=20144' ts-node --logError --transpile-only src/adaptors/handlers/storeAdaptorData/storeAll.ts  2>&1 | tee dimensionsRun.log; node src/api2/scripts/printDimensionRunStats.js  2>&1 | tee dimensionsRunStats2.log
